title: Unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information
body: iam new to this game. i tried to install the game and it was repeatedly saying that unspecified error . i did retry a lot of times but still it didn't work. please help me??????

replies.body: To add on to what Targon said. Right click on the LoLinstaller and select "run as administrator". If that doesn't work try plugging your computer into an Ethernet cable if you are using wireless. Also make sure you are on a network which has full access. Some networks like school networks may block certain IPs which can cause issues with patching.

It sounds like you're running into issues while patching. These issues are often caused by missing administrative privileges or connectivity issues to the patching servers. I strongly suggest working through the consolidated solutions in our [patching issues guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)

Let me know if those steps helped.
